data.title: 08112019 - Mixed reactions trail sack of Osinbajo's 35 aides
data.text: FG suspends fuel supply to stations at land borders •Stop terrorising innocent citizens, Masari warns customs STATE OF ROADS: Rep challenges Fashola to 90-day road travel tour P&ID supply scam: Court grants Briton, Nolan, N500m bail 9 8 14 WEEKEND GROOVE Ovuleria of New Masquerade speaks! Agusto & Co ranks Zenith best digital bank in 2019 24 9 VOL. 26: NO. 63936 FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 8, 2019 Mixed reactions trail sack of Osinbajo's 35 aides 5 •Rift between Buhari, Osinbajo imaginary; hatched by mischief-makers —CAN •Handle this issue with care —Junaid Muhammed •Buhari may not be aware — PANDEF; VP's aide denies list LIST OF SACKED AIDES •Jibola Ajayi, Special Adviser, Legal •Lanre Osinbona, Senior Special Assistant, ICT •Imeh Okon, Senior Special Assistant, Infrastructure •Jide Awolowo, Special Adviser, Oil & Gas •Lilian Idiaghe, Special Adviser, Research, Legal & Compliance •Arukaino Umukoro, Special Adviser, Niger Delta •Bala Liman Mohammed, Senior Special Assistant, Economy •Edobor Iyamu, Senior Special Assistant, Niger Delta •Dolapo Bright, Senior Special Assistant, Agro- Allied Value Chain •Toyosi Onaolapo, Special Adviser, Community Engagement •Gambo Manzo, Special Adviser, Political Continues on Page ‘How we can make Disapora boards work’ 2019 NYSC BATCH ‘C’ STREAM 1, ABUJA... Corps members engaging in Tug-of-War, during their inauguration at the NYSC Permanent Orientation Camp at Kubwa, Abuja, yesterday. Photo: NAN. FG pays N157.35bn PAYE tax arrears to states Senate probes security agencies in Lagos ports over N263bn alleged fraud 8 8 35 VP’s security men beat up Vanguard photo-journalist at Aso Villa •Abayomi Adeshida 10 EID-EL-MAULUD: FG declares 39 Monday public holiday Mr & Mrs DONU 17 OWEI 31 AZU 36
